coded_answer.p: I am writing in reply to your enquiry about this yearyear's international conference.

The conference will be held at The Palace Hotel on Old Street. There will be signs to follow from the Centralcentral train station. The conference is commensingcommencingcommences on 31st June 2001 from 10.00-15.00. LightA light lunch will be provided.
After the conference, there will be a relaxing party. There is no dressed-codedress code for the party. However, I suggest you could wear the same outfit asthat you wearwill wear for the conference.

I have included thea local map, there. There are some ideas aton the back of the map. Please let me know if you would like to book one of the city-walk tours,. We have arrangearranged spacialspecial discounts for the conference attendanceattendees. PersonlyPersonally I recommend the Dicken'sDickens tour because it is a good length of walkingwalk and very historical.
I hope that I have covered all the information you wouldwill need and look forward to seeing you.
P.S. Please find the enclosed mapmap enclosed.
There are several interesting buildings in the city of London. I believe Liverpool Street Station is at the top of the list.
The building itself looks grand and elegant. Despite the fact that this building has servedserves half-ahalf a million commuters in a day, it is always clean and functional.

There are two parts of Liverpool Street Station that make it so interesting a building. The newly decorated section is fairly modern in style with escalators and touched-screentouch-screen ticket machinemachines. It is also very well linked intoto the old underground station, which it is such a contrast in transformation. The old bit is rather unique and charming. You couldcan really imagine howwhat it looked like in the old daythe old days.

There is another surprising section in this building. At the far backside of the station it is also connected to a spacious, well designedwell-designed pedestrianspedestrians'public park. It is a good example of a great architecture that was designed to provide services tofor the public.
Finally, it is in the heart of the city and everyone wouldwill be able to find it without doubtwithout doubt everyone will be able to find it.
